name: The Wild Pear World!
description:
In my land, everything is being destroyed. The earth is getting warmer. I have not seen polar bears, but the pear tree that lives in our house was always happy; But its fruits have not been fresh for several years! Fruits that fall to the ground. The gardener sees the reason as dehydration, and I see the reason as a factory that darkens the sky a few kilometers away with a large chimney.
Pouriasimin
